description: A React component for a pricing page that allows users to input base price, demand factor, and competitor price, and then computes a recommended price based on these inputs, including fallback logic if the backend API call fails.

methods.name: PricingPage
methods.description: Main React functional component for the pricing page, handling state, user input, and price recommendation logic.

methods.name: compute
methods.description: Asynchronous function invoked to fetch a recommended price from the backend or fallback calculation.
